EmailTemplate.subject: Private and Confidential: Letter from Insight Wellbeing at Work
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Private and Confidential - The contents of this email and its attachments are strictly for the addressee(s) only
To whom it may concern,
Please find attached a letter from Insight Healthcare Wellbeing at Work.
This letter is in PDF format. Please get in touch with the service by contacting admin.wellbeingatwork@insighthealthcare.org to request the letter in another format.
Insight Wellbeing At Work
The phone number for your local 24/7 Mental Health Crisis Line can be found here: https://www.nhs.uk/service-search/mental-health/find-an-urgent-mental-health-helpline
If you are unable to keep yourself safe please use the number for your local team to speak to staff who will support and signpost you to the most appropriate team. You should still call 999 or go to A&E if you have an immediate, life-threatening emergency requiring mental or physical health assistance.
Insight Healthcare is a not for profit organisation and is part of Concern: The mental health and wellbeing group. Registered Office: Buttress House, 36 Brenkley Way, Seaton Burn, Newcastle Upon Tyne, NE13 6DS Company registered in England & Wales, Reg. Number: 4391008
This message may contain confidential information. If you are not the intended recipient, please inform the sender that you have received the message in error and then delete it. Please do not disclose, copy or share information in this e-mail or take any action in relation to its contents. To do so is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. Thank you for your co-operation.
